content: 1 mc 8 single_crochet = 8 sts round 1 mc 8 single_crochet = 8 sts round 2 single_crochet around = 8 sts round 2 single_crochet around = 8 sts round 3 increase around = 16 sts round 3 increase around = 16 sts round 4 and round 5 single_crochet around = 16 sts fig round 4 single_crochet increase repeat around = 24 sts 19 round 6 2 decrease 12 single_crochet = 14 sts round 5 through round 9 single_crochet around = 24 sts round 7 single_crochet around = 14 sts round 10 4 single_crochet decrease repeat around = 20 sts round 8 2 decrease 10 single_crochet = 12 sts round 11 through round 13 single_crochet around = 20 sts round 9 through round 15 single_crochet around = 12 sts round 14 3 single_crochet decrease repeat around = 16 sts slip_stitch bind off with tail for sewing fig 20 round 15 through round 17 single_crochet around = 16 sts round 18 6 single_crochet decrease repeat around = 14 sts round 19 single_crochet around = 14 sts round 20 single_crochet 4 increase single_crochet 4 decrease = 14 sts slip_stitch bind off with tail for sewing fig 21 & 22 make sure you lightly stuff all four feet you can also add some bead filling in panty hose to each end- that ll give them more weight i didn t in these but you make it your own 12 © emmy scanga 2020 tail *in body color -- crochet in the round* round 1 mc 8 single_crochet = 8 sts round 2 single_crochet around = 8 sts round 3 increase around = 16 sts round 4 single_crochet increase repeat around = 24 sts round 5 and round 6 single_crochet around = 24 sts round 7 single_crochet skip 7 sts- push these stitches away from you so they bulge to the inside fig 23 slip_stitch = 2 sts the last 15 sts are unused fig 24 bind off with tail for sewing onto body no need to stuff prepping for assembly… before you start the assembly process you ll want to place markers- pins scraps of yarns or store-bought stitch markers will h7 work here- at the first and last stitch on each of the following body part if you didn t add them as you created the pieces fig b1 25 t16 b2 head row 7 h7 t15 body row 1 b1 t13 row 2 b2 photo shows b3 but it needs to be b2 b9 row 9 b9 t11 row 11 b11 b11 tummy row 1 t1 row 11 t11 row 13 t13 t1 row 15 t15 13 row 16 t16 © emmy scanga 2020 i have videos in response to my customers i have started creating instagram live videos to help with the assembly process part it s a real time process of assembly of the pride themed mallow i made in june of one 2020 you ll hear me interact with those that were there for live but it is
